abstract: The debt-restructuring plan of Dubai World may prove to be “negative” for its bank creditors because loan repayments will be financed by asset sales and dividends, according to JPMorgan Chase.
snippet: The debt-restructuring plan of Dubai World may prove to be “negative” for its bank creditors because loan repayments will be financed by asset sales and dividends, according to JPMorgan Chase.
lead_paragraph: The debt-restructuring plan of Dubai World may prove to be “negative” for its bank creditors because loan repayments will be financed by asset sales and dividends, according to JPMorgan Chase, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: JPMorgan Says Dubai Plan May Be ‘Negative’ for Banks
